actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a refundable credit to grandparents who provide primary child care services without compensation for their grandchildren who are not their dependents.
short_title: Grandchild Care Tax Relief Act of 2000

summary.text: Amend the Internal Revenue Code to allow a $500 refundable credit for each grandchild to grandparents who provide primary child care services without compensation for their grandchildren who are not their dependents.

titles.title: Grandchild Care Tax Relief Act of 2000

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a refundable credit to grandparents who provide primary child care services without compensation for their grandchildren who are not their dependents.
